channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Can You Get Rich Using a Raspberry Pi to Mine Cryptocurrency?
item.description: The profit margin on crypto mining is all about the physics of computers and energy conversion.

item.title: The Real Cognitive Neuroscience Behind ‘Severance’
item.description: The “severance procedure” isn't real—but some of Severance’s ideas aren’t as out-there as you may think.

item.title: Rivian finalizes $6.6B loan for its Georgia factory
item.description: Rivian and the Department of Energy have finalized a $6.6 billion loan announced in November with just a few days left until Donald Trump’s inaugurati...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Turns His Back on the Media
item.description: The Meta CEO is abandoning his commitment to the truth in favor of a Trump-style playbook.

item.title: Instabase raises $100M to help companies process unstructured document data
item.description: Instabase, a company that creates software for extracting processing unstructured data from myriad document types, has raised $100 million in a Series...

item.title: Trump spoke to China’s President Xi about TikTok just ahead of Supreme Court ruling

item.title: WiiM Amp Pro Review: Name a Better Network Amp, We'll Wait
item.description: This is the best cheap network amplifier you can buy right now.

item.title: Supreme Court upholds TikTok ban
item.description: The Supreme Court has upheld the law that will effectively ban TikTok on Sunday, January 19. The decision marks the end of TikTok’s months-long legal ...

item.title: Ken Howery: the tech mogul at the center of Trump’s Greenland ambition
item.description: Surprise! Donald Trump’s big, audacious ambition to buy Greenland from Denmark has a tech angle. Ken Howery, named by U.S. President-elect Trump’s pic...
